name: Johnny
bio: Hi! I‚Äôm Johnny ‚Äî a lifelong dog person with over 15 years of hands-on experience caring for dogs of all ages, temperaments, and personalities. I specialize in providing a calm, structured, small-group environment that helps pups feel safe and relaxed from the moment they arrive.

My home is set up intentionally for comfort: peaceful spaces, cozy resting spots, a fully fenced patio for outdoor breaks, and a clean, well-kept environment that stays tidy throughout your dog‚Äôs stay. I host only friendly, house-trained pups so every dog enjoys a smooth, low-stress experience.
My Care Style
I take a thoughtful, attentive approach with every dog:
‚Ä¢ Gentle, low-stress introductions to help dogs settle in
‚Ä¢ Clear, consistent routines tailored to your pup‚Äôs comfort
‚Ä¢ Calm group dynamics with close supervision
‚Ä¢ Reading & supporting dog body language to keep interactions positive
‚Ä¢ A peaceful environment with plenty of affection, enrichment, and relaxation
Whether your pup is shy, energetic, or somewhere in between, I adjust the pace so they feel understood and safe.
What Pet Parents Can Expect
‚Ä¢ A warm, upscale home environment ‚Äî never chaotic like a kennel
‚Ä¢ Predictable daily rhythms that help dogs relax
‚Ä¢ Thoughtful group play with close oversight
‚Ä¢ Clean, tidy spaces (I deep-clean after every stay)
‚Ä¢ Optional add-ons for enrichment, outings, or vacation-style fun
‚Ä¢ Reliable photo/video updates so you always know how your pup is doing
Your dog becomes part of my family during their stay ‚Äî cared for with patience, presence, and the same attention I give my own pets.
I‚Äôm here to give your pup a retreat of their own ‚Äî calm, structured, and filled with genuine care. I can‚Äôt wait to welcome them into my home. üêæ‚ú®

name: Trudy
tagline: Lakeview adventures from a calm Wildomar home
bio: Hi, I‚Äôm Trudy ‚Äî a lifelong dog person with years of hands-on experience caring for pups of all breeds, ages, and personalities.

As a full-time stay-at-home mom, caring for dogs has become one of my greatest joys. Over the years, friends, neighbors, and family naturally began turning to me as their ‚Äúgo-to‚Äù sitter because of my calm approach, gentle presence, and the way dogs settle in easily around me. Whether your pup is energetic, anxious, or brand new to being away from home, my goal is always the same: to help them feel safe, relaxed, and completely at ease during their stay.
My Care Style
I take a patient, loving, and attentive approach with every dog:
‚Ä¢ Gentle, low-stress introductions that help pups settle in confidently
‚Ä¢ Clear, comforting routines for meals, potty breaks, naps, and play
‚Ä¢ Calm group dynamics‚Äîsupervised closely and always based on each dog‚Äôs comfort
‚Ä¢ Understanding each dog‚Äôs cues, personality, and energy level
‚Ä¢ A peaceful home environment where shy, senior, or first-time-away pups feel secure
‚Ä¢ Plenty of affection, enrichment, and relaxation time
‚Ä¢ Whether your pup is outgoing, mellow, or somewhere in between, I adjust the pace so they feel understood and safe
What Pet Parents Can Expect
‚Ä¢ A warm, family-style home environment‚Äînever chaotic like a kennel
‚Ä¢ Predictable daily rhythms that help dogs relax
‚Ä¢ Thoughtful, low-stress dog introductions
‚Ä¢ Clean, comfort-focused spaces with cozy resting spots
‚Ä¢ A secure outdoor area for fresh-air breaks and lounging
‚Ä¢ Attentive supervision and companionship all day long
‚Ä¢ Reliable photo/video updates (1‚Äì2 per day) so you always know how your pup is doing
‚Ä¢ Optional add-ons, such as nature walks, cuddles, brushing, and treat outings

I genuinely treat every dog like they‚Äôre part of my own family. Whether your pup loves to trot around the yard or prefers cozy naps and gentle cuddles, I meet them exactly where they are so they feel loved, supported, and right at home.
I can‚Äôt wait to welcome your pup into my home and give them the care, comfort, and warmth they deserve. ‚ú®üêæ

No children in the home, keeping the environment low-stress and predictable
Dogs allowed on furniture and beds ‚Äî pups relax just like they would at home
